MAGGI 2-Min Curry 5 Packs, 79g Each

• 2-minute instant noodles • Contains 5 individual packets of 79g • Real curry taste • Source of wheat protein • Made with real chillies and 12 secret spices • Slow-cooked to perfection for great curry taste • With our springy noodle • Each serving (79g) contains 351kcal • HALAL certified Don\'t know what to eat? Cook yourself a delicious bowl of MAGGI® 2-Minute Noodles Curry. Made with real chillies and a secret blend of 12 spices, it is coupled together with our springy noodles made from Australian wheat grains that promises satisfaction with every slurp. Throw in your favourite fresh ingredients for a richer taste and a balanced meal. It’s no wonder that it is still a Malaysian favourite till today!

T&Cs
About Click n\' Shop

\t\t\tThe project to develop is a mobile shopping application that serves all the shopping needs, namely Click n\' Shop. It is not just an ordinary shopping platform, but an app that offers a smarter way to shop by offering personalised experiences for every user. The key stakeholders of the entire project would be customers and brand partners. Leveraging on the reputation of brand partners, Click n\' Shop connects customers to the brands of their choice, assuring them to find 100% authentic products within the platform.\n\n\t\t\tThe project offers a complete shopping journey from finding their desired products, in-app secure checkout, tracking orders to product reviews. As ofr brand partners, the app offers the ability to create discounts and promotions, customise banners, as well as customise brand pages, to drive traffic especially during the festive season, allowing our customers to shop for the best deal. ultimately, this app served as a one-stop platform that brings convenience to our customers to acquire whatever they want right at their fingertips.
Yoong Kai Leon

How do I start selling on Click n\' Shop?

To start selling on Click n\' Shop, you must first create a seller account.\n\nYou can set up your shop via Click n\' Shop seller center to upload products, enable shipping options and setup marketing promotion for your shop.
How can I apply my vouchers?
You can select available voucher(s) during checkout.\n\nPlease take note that each voucher has it own Terms & Conditions.
How can I update my personal information?
You can check and update your personal information by navigating to My Profile > My Details.
How to apply for refunds?

You may raise a refund request when you receive the product not more than 7 days with following conditions:
1. wrong product (e.g wrong variant, different products, wrong size)
2. faulty product
3. incomplete product
4. product with physical damage

To apply for a refund, you can navigate to My Profile > My Order. Click on your order, then click the "Request for refund" button at the bottom of the page.
Please specific the reason of the refund request and insert the picture proof of your claim.

Refund request are subject to approval. You are advisable to chat with the seller before applying for refund.
How can I contact Customer Service?

To contact product seller customer service, you can click on the chat button from product page or shop page.\n\nTo contact Click n\' Shop Customer Service, you can proceed to My Profile > Chat, and look for the Click n\' Shop Customer Service.
By placing an order you agree to our\nTerms And Conditions
